Prerequisite: Order of the Ghostslayer

When a creature you can see within 30 feet of you ends it's turn without moving, you can use your reaction to reduce their movement speed to 0 until the end of the creature's next turn. Additionally, the creature's movement speed cannot be increased in anyway until the curse ends.

Amplify. This curse lasts up to 1 minute, and whenever the creature ends it's turn without moving it takes randiant damage equal to one roll of your hemocraft die plus your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1). If the creature moves on it's turn then it takes radiant damage equal a number of hemocraft die equal to your Intelligence modifier (minimum of 1). Starting after the end of the creature's next turn, the cursed creature can make a Charisma saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the curse on itself on a success.
